about_the_game:
Take control of a new prototype spaceship that's been shrunken by new military technology to defeat the Rogue AI which threatens billions of lives with a potential black hole event.

However, upon infiltration your spaceship has been partially hacked, preventing you from slowing down! Skilfully avoid obstacles controlled by the Rogue AI and ultimately destroy the "Mega-Brain".



Master the use of your Boost, Shield, Missiles and Guns to beat the Campaign and unlock Special Operations! Or test your skills in the Infinite Levels that range from Easy to Hard to achieve a High Score on each one.

All game modes will reward you with Ship Parts which are used to purchase new and better spaceships!

Fight against the Rogue AI Cyborgs who try to stop you!



Use your Shield system to become temporarily immune to all damage, as one hit or crash would normally kill you.

Shoot your missile to deal heavy AoE damage, push certain objects or destroy asteroids and mines.



Use your Boost to speed run through levels whilst enjoying the adrenaline of going fast!

content_descriptors.notes: Some levels contain fights against gruesome monsters, with some blood and corpses (Cyborgs, Brains, Dinosaurs).

detailed_description:
Take control of a new prototype spaceship that's been shrunken by new military technology to defeat the Rogue AI which threatens billions of lives with a potential black hole event.

However, upon infiltration your spaceship has been partially hacked, preventing you from slowing down! Skilfully avoid obstacles controlled by the Rogue AI and ultimately destroy the "Mega-Brain".



Master the use of your Boost, Shield, Missiles and Guns to beat the Campaign and unlock Special Operations! Or test your skills in the Infinite Levels that range from Easy to Hard to achieve a High Score on each one.

All game modes will reward you with Ship Parts which are used to purchase new and better spaceships!

Fight against the Rogue AI Cyborgs who try to stop you!



Use your Shield system to become temporarily immune to all damage, as one hit or crash would normally kill you.

Shoot your missile to deal heavy AoE damage, push certain objects or destroy asteroids and mines.



Use your Boost to speed run through levels whilst enjoying the adrenaline of going fast!

name: Shrink Assault

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP and above (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 750 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Shrink Assault is a Sci-Fi game featuring a mix of Infinite Runners and Rail Shooter games! Skilfully control your spaceship to dodge obstacles and eliminate the threat! Can you survive?
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Ukrainian*
*languages with full audio support
